answers.answer: Have you checked your blood pressure?? Swollen feet may be a sign of preeclampsia

Yes i have spd real bad in only 30 weeks if a birthing ball doesn't help get a back run or a pelvis rub that helps me only for a short while oh and try to rest it might help 2 and put your feet up when u can
My Blood Pressure Has Been Super Low

question: I have been walking and using the exercise ball all weekend and at work today I noticed my feet are balloons and I have so much pelvic pain with every step I wanted to cry. It feels like grinding a rock inside of me. Anyone have this?  If so did labor follow?  I kept thinking this baby will be an April fools kid but not so sure anymore.
title: pelvic
